title: Self-healing amino acid-bearing acrylamides/n-butyl acrylate copolymers via multiple noncovalent bonds
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,7850-7857
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00800F, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Ryo Kudo, Sadaki Samitsu, Hideharu Mori
Four amino acid-bearing acrylamides, N-acryloyl-L-threonine, N-acryloyl-L-glutamic acid, N-acryloyl-L-phenylalanine, and N-acryloyl-L, L-diphenylalanine, were copolymerized with n-butyl acrylate to develop amino acid-based self-healable copolymers.
